story:
AirFlow's Creator Speaks Out


      

      

Everything today is moving towards a sensor-based interface with our mobile devices and hardware in general, like PCs and consoles (Kinect, Oculus Rift, Primesense). The next logical step is to be able to extract musical segments from the intuitive motions of a user, in a single and fluid movement sequence. AirFlow offers anyone this possibility without having to be a professional musician.                                                                                                                                                                                   We bring you the first Smartphone App for Music Creation based on body movement. You use the everyday motion from your body to create musical beats and songs using AirFlow, with many features to enrich the experience even more.
The idea to is be as intuitive as possible. We live in a world of movement and action. This is energy that we create on a daily basis, so why not put it to good use? AirFlow combines a fun and light interface with the creative experience of making music, either by yourself or with a group of friends simultaneously, along with aesthetics of the highest level.                                                                                                        

The AirFlow Team is passionate about sensor-based interaction with our smartphones. We see the potential this has, as we are just touching the surface. We want to be part of this and show the world that it can be creative, fun and active at the same time. We need your support and contributions to get there and we are counting on all the creative people out there to help us reach our goal, so that we can make this a reality. We provide the tools. You provide the creativity and motion.   


FEATURED ON

                                                                                               http://tech.co/airflow-will-make-music-smartphones-movements-2016-02

 

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               http://www.crowdfunding-categories.com/campaign/airflow-music-through-movement-94                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               

http://socialmedia.biz/2016/02/15/more-than-just-streaming-create-music-that-reaches-into-the-social-media-sphere/                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       


First, we would like to create awareness for this new expression of the crossover between music, and the movement of our daily life. This is what we like to call the Soundtrack to Your Life. We chose to go the indie way and not to succumb to raising the funds we needed via VC as is customary. We want to create a community of people who appreciate how creative this can be, and to be able to raise enough funds together to get AirFlow where it needs to go, so that everyone can enjoy making music with it. We want people who share our vision and love music as much as we do. Come and be part of something amazing and innovative! Visit us on Social Media and at our website www.airflowtheapp.com. Email us at info@airflowtheapp.com for any questions.
  Follow us on the Web 

     

                                                                                                                                                 FB 

Instagram

Pinterest 

Twitter

                                                                                                                                                                       

       

 AirFlow is the first fully kinesiological mobile app for music creation, designed for Android and iOS mobile devices. It translates different body movements into different tracks, enabling you to  create a song by moving with your smartphone, even dancing. It uses the sensors already built into the mobile device to give the user an opportunity to create a beat or a full song using a pre-determined, very simple sequence of movements.     
                            
                                                                                 

                                     

  
You choose a Beat mode that characterizes your mood and what you want to create. Under that category, you drag and drop different beats and instruments from the available Library into the designated slots. Each slot has a specific movement attributed to it. Like this, you choose which beats will be associated with which movement. You follow by setting the Tempo, and the Bar (the measure). These help you with the speed and timing of your creation. You also have the Click button, which is a simple Metronome.Then, you start moving in Live or Practice mode, and you can witness the outcome in real-time, and view the amazing AudioVisual Rendition afterwards.                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      

                                   

                                                                                                                                                                                  

                              Beat Creation with your Body Movement

    
        


    

 

You can save your newly created track under the Mode you started with. With a Premium Profile, you have access to amazing new features:                                               

-A Web-based Profile that you can customize and link with you friends.                       

-Share your various creations on Facebook as well as with your friends on the AirFlow Network.                                                                                                                                 

-Enjoy the Noizmee Plugin, which enables you to record sounds from everyday life and incorporate them in your tracks.                                                                                             

-Enjoy the GroupCreate feature, which enables you to create a track together with up to 10 users, with each one serving as a different instrument or beat, all united in the creation of one awesome track.                                                                                               

-Enjoy the ability to monetize your beats by selling them or buying other users beats.

-Get new beat and sound libraries, so you have updated and fresh new tracks to create, even some with your favorite artists.


                                                                                                                                                                 

                                          

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Regardless of your profile, you immediately become a part of the AirFlow family, with constant updates from our Social Media Team, and a great Youtube Channel where you can send us cool videos of you performing with your tracks and share them with our community.                     

                                                                                                                                                                               What your beat looks like when it is done                                                                                                                                                                                                  

   


                                                                                                                                                                    We want to raise funds for the completion of the development of the AirFlow app for Android and iOS.  The development work is unique since there is no predecessor to this technology and will cover both Apple and Android devices, so that will double the task. The development includes our Web-based content, with the AirFlow community Network, its user profiles, their management, beat libraries and their creation, and the ability to buy and sell each other's beats and tracks. Also included are our future plugins and our GroupCreate Feature. We are developing new technology and exploring a new dimension of what we can extract from our smartphones. The development includes all musical aspects as well as labor that will need be external to our team. Collectively, the funds we are seeking will enable our team to take the AirFlow to launch on iOS and Android, and will cover our Marketing campaign and Promotion for the months leading to launch and afterwards. Thirdly, it will cover our maintenance, hosting, and other technical aspects for the first 6 months, and enable our team to pursue some further development ideas. Lastly, it will help with some of our business and legal expenditures.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           

   

 

       

                 

               

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           






  


 We welcome the challenges associated with AirFlow with open arms as they are part of the birth of our product. The main obstacles we will face and overcome are:    
                                                                                                                     1. Synchronizing the beat, the audio and the audiovisual rendering with no delay on Android and iOS.            
2.The GroupCreate feature engaging 10 people in the creation of one beat, totally synchronized in real-time.   
3. Constantly creating new content to keep our community of users engaged and happy, with new beat libraries and innovative plugins.  
4.The new exploration of wrist and arm powered movement interfacing with a smartphone. We love to see what AirFlow will bring in the near future.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        

              



  • Do I need any musical experience? 

You need absolutely no experience to use AirFlow, just a passion for music, creativity and an Android or iOS device. We believe prerequisite musical knowledge excludes too many users and doesn't give them a voice or an opportunity to create.

  • Will anyone be able to use it?  

Yes, that is exactly the idea.We are looking to create a community based on creativity, fun, motion and simplicity. We believe that music as it stands today excludes a lot of people that perhaps don't have the musical background but may be amazingly creative and could make beautiful tracks, We believe in being a global platform that unites our users and provides them with the tools they need.

  • What is Airflow?

AirFlow is the first smartphone application of its kind. It offers its users the opportunity to create music using their body movements while holding their device. There is a number of pre-set movements built into the system and an instrument or a beat is attributed to each of them. Then you begin composing your track by moving, and you see where it takes you as you create it. It is a new way to look at our devices. We carry them all day long, they have become and indispensable part of our lives and we thought "why not explore this extra dimension?." They go where we go. They move how we move. AirFlow was born.

  •  How does it work? 
We decided  upon a set of 5 movements that we use instinctively when we have our phones with us. With the pre-set movements, you choose the instruments and beats you wish to use from within our Library, by simply drag-and-dropping them in the designated track box. You have access to a second set of 5 tracks with the same movements if you want to use more than 5 layers. You set the Tempo, the Bar, and you can use the Click feature as well, which is a metronome.Then, you can use Practice Mode or record in Live Mode. When you are done, you can Save, Share, or Edit the track into a full song using our Premium features. You will also be able to create a profile with friends, upload your own videos, and sell your music, as well as purchase the music of your friends and network. You can team up with up to 10 friends, with each one acting as if they were one beat or instrument, and create one track together. We will choose amazing videos and songs and upload them to our Youtube Channel as well.

  • Why are you raising funds?
In a world of Venture Capital, as much as we appreciate how mainstream fundraising goes, we love Indiegogo and how it gives the people a voice in terms of what they like. There is no better way to get honest feedback, and to create awareness and support. The fundraising part is just one of the aspects that we love with Crowdfunding, and we are thankful that we have platforms that we may do this on in this day in age.

  • Where can I download AirFlow?
AirFlow will be available for download on the App Store for iOS users and on the Google Play Store for Android users.

  • Is it free? 

AirFlow will be available on the App Store and on Google Play Store free of charge. The app functions on a Freemium model. It is free to download, and gives the user an option to upgrade to a Premium account to take advantage of many of its features, like  GroupCreate and the ability to monetize your creations.
story_txt:
AirFlow's Creator Speaks Out
            
Everything today is moving towards a sensor-based interface with our mobile devices and hardware in general, like PCs and consoles (Kinect, Oculus Rift, Primesense). The next logical step is to be able to extract musical segments from the intuitive motions of a user, in a single and fluid movement sequence. AirFlow offers anyone this possibility without having to be a professional musician.                                                                                                                                                                                   We bring you the first Smartphone App for Music Creation based on body movement. You use the everyday motion from your body to create musical beats and songs using AirFlow, with many features to enrich the experience even more.The idea to is be as intuitive as possible. We live in a world of movement and action. This is energy that we create on a daily basis, so why not put it to good use? AirFlow combines a fun and light interface with the creative experience of making music, either by yourself or with a group of friends simultaneously, along with aesthetics of the highest level.                                                                                                        The AirFlow Team is passionate about sensor-based interaction with our smartphones. We see the potential this has, as we are just touching the surface. We want to be part of this and show the world that it can be creative, fun and active at the same time. We need your support and contributions to get there and we are counting on all the creative people out there to help us reach our goal, so that we can make this a reality. We provide the tools. You provide the creativity and motion.   FEATURED ON                                                                                               http://tech.co/airflow-will-make-music-smartphones-movements-2016-02                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                http://www.crowdfunding-categories.com/campaign/airflow-music-through-movement-94                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                http://socialmedia.biz/2016/02/15/more-than-just-streaming-create-music-that-reaches-into-the-social-media-sphere/                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       
First, we would like to create awareness for this new expression of the crossover between music, and the movement of our daily life. This is what we like to call the Soundtrack to Your Life. We chose to go the indie way and not to succumb to raising the funds we needed via VC as is customary. We want to create a community of people who appreciate how creative this can be, and to be able to raise enough funds together to get AirFlow where it needs to go, so that everyone can enjoy making music with it. We want people who share our vision and love music as much as we do. Come and be part of something amazing and innovative! Visit us on Social Media and at our website www.airflowtheapp.com. Email us at info@airflowtheapp.com for any questions.
  Follow us on the Web 
     
                                                                                                                                                 FB 
InstagramPinterest Twitter                                                                                                                                                                                AirFlow is the first fully kinesiological mobile app for music creation, designed for Android and iOS mobile devices. It translates different body movements into different tracks, enabling you to  create a song by moving with your smartphone, even dancing. It uses the sensors already built into the mobile device to give the user an opportunity to create a beat or a full song using a pre-determined, very simple sequence of movements.     
                            
                                                                                                                        


You choose a Beat mode that characterizes your mood and what you want to create. Under that category, you drag and drop different beats and instruments from the available Library into the designated slots. Each slot has a specific movement attributed to it. Like this, you choose which beats will be associated with which movement. You follow by setting the Tempo, and the Bar (the measure). These help you with the speed and timing of your creation. You also have the Click button, which is a simple Metronome.Then, you start moving in Live or Practice mode, and you can witness the outcome in real-time, and view the amazing AudioVisual Rendition afterwards.                    


                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Beat Creation with your Body Movement


            



    


 


You can save your newly created track under the Mode you started with. With a Premium Profile, you have access to amazing new features:                                               


-A Web-based Profile that you can customize and link with you friends.                       


-Share your various creations on Facebook as well as with your friends on the AirFlow Network.                                                                                                                                 


-Enjoy the Noizmee Plugin, which enables you to record sounds from everyday life and incorporate them in your tracks.                                                                                             


-Enjoy the GroupCreate feature, which enables you to create a track together with up to 10 users, with each one serving as a different instrument or beat, all united in the creation of one awesome track.                                                                                               


-Enjoy the ability to monetize your beats by selling them or buying other users beats.

-Get new beat and sound libraries, so you have updated and fresh new tracks to create, even some with your favorite artists.

                                                                                                                                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Regardless of your profile, you immediately become a part of the AirFlow family, with constant updates from our Social Media Team, and a great Youtube Channel where you can send us cool videos of you performing with your tracks and share them with our community.                     
                                                                                                                                                                               What your beat looks like when it is done                                                                                                                                                                                                  
                                                                                                                                                                       We want to raise funds for the completion of the development of the AirFlow app for Android and iOS.  The development work is unique since there is no predecessor to this technology and will cover both Apple and Android devices, so that will double the task. The development includes our Web-based content, with the AirFlow community Network, its user profiles, their management, beat libraries and their creation, and the ability to buy and sell each other's beats and tracks. Also included are our future plugins and our GroupCreate Feature. We are developing new technology and exploring a new dimension of what we can extract from our smartphones. The development includes all musical aspects as well as labor that will need be external to our team. Collectively, the funds we are seeking will enable our team to take the AirFlow to launch on iOS and Android, and will cover our Marketing campaign and Promotion for the months leading to launch and afterwards. Thirdly, it will cover our maintenance, hosting, and other technical aspects for the first 6 months, and enable our team to pursue some further development ideas. Lastly, it will help with some of our business and legal expenditures.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
         



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            












  

  We welcome the challenges associated with AirFlow with open arms as they are part of the birth of our product. The main obstacles we will face and overcome are:    


                                                                                                                     1. Synchronizing the beat, the audio and the audiovisual rendering with no delay on Android and iOS.            


2.The GroupCreate feature engaging 10 people in the creation of one beat, totally synchronized in real-time.   


3. Constantly creating new content to keep our community of users engaged and happy, with new beat libraries and innovative plugins.  


4.The new exploration of wrist and arm powered movement interfacing with a smartphone. We love to see what AirFlow will bring in the near future.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        

              




Do I need any musical experience? 
You need absolutely no experience to use AirFlow, just a passion for music, creativity and an Android or iOS device. We believe prerequisite musical knowledge excludes too many users and doesn't give them a voice or an opportunity to create.
Will anyone be able to use it?  
Yes, that is exactly the idea.We are looking to create a community based on creativity, fun, motion and simplicity. We believe that music as it stands today excludes a lot of people that perhaps don't have the musical background but may be amazingly creative and could make beautiful tracks, We believe in being a global platform that unites our users and provides them with the tools they need.
What is Airflow?
AirFlow is the first smartphone application of its kind. It offers its users the opportunity to create music using their body movements while holding their device. There is a number of pre-set movements built into the system and an instrument or a beat is attributed to each of them. Then you begin composing your track by moving, and you see where it takes you as you create it. It is a new way to look at our devices. We carry them all day long, they have become and indispensable part of our lives and we thought "why not explore this extra dimension?." They go where we go. They move how we move. AirFlow was born.
 How does it work? 
We decided  upon a set of 5 movements that we use instinctively when we have our phones with us. With the pre-set movements, you choose the instruments and beats you wish to use from within our Library, by simply drag-and-dropping them in the designated track box. You have access to a second set of 5 tracks with the same movements if you want to use more than 5 layers. You set the Tempo, the Bar, and you can use the Click feature as well, which is a metronome.Then, you can use Practice Mode or record in Live Mode. When you are done, you can Save, Share, or Edit the track into a full song using our Premium features. You will also be able to create a profile with friends, upload your own videos, and sell your music, as well as purchase the music of your friends and network. You can team up with up to 10 friends, with each one acting as if they were one beat or instrument, and create one track together. We will choose amazing videos and songs and upload them to our Youtube Channel as well.

Why are you raising funds?

In a world of Venture Capital, as much as we appreciate how mainstream fundraising goes, we love Indiegogo and how it gives the people a voice in terms of what they like. There is no better way to get honest feedback, and to create awareness and support. The fundraising part is just one of the aspects that we love with Crowdfunding, and we are thankful that we have platforms that we may do this on in this day in age.



Where can I download AirFlow?


AirFlow will be available for download on the App Store for iOS users and on the Google Play Store for Android users.


Is it free? 
AirFlow will be available on the App Store and on Google Play Store free of charge. The app functions on a Freemium model. It is free to download, and gives the user an option to upgrade to a Premium account to take advantage of many of its features, like  GroupCreate and the ability to monetize your creations.

story:
My Story

My name is Mehlek Pfisha and I've been writing and recording Christian Hip Hop since 2007.  I am very passionate about presenting the Truth of God in the form of Hip Hop and using my life's lesson to show Christ to the world.

I released an EP in 2011 and an album in 2014. 

I was recently presented with an opportunity to perform at a major event the weekend of the Stellar Awards in Las Vegas Feb 19th, 2015.

This opportunity will help my music gain more support and momentum as I embark on recording and releasing my sophomore album entitled "The One"


What We Need

I am asking for $1000 to pay for travel and all related promotional expenses for this event.

If I am unable to raise all the funds necessary, I will use the remaining funds to fuel the engineering, production and promotion of my sophomore album entitled "The One."

The Impact

I have been a supporter of Hip Hop since I was a child, but when I came to know Jesus Christ, I decided that Hip Hop needed a makeover.  It is a beautiful artform, when dedicated to glorifying Jesus, and I want to show the world just how cool it is to love and rock with Jesus on a daily basis.

Risks & Challenges

Performing at this event is not a guarantee that I will gain support.  If I don't rock the stage, or if they feel my music just isn't good enough, it could be a wasted trip.  But I have been perfecting my craft for a long time, and am very confident that there will be some who do support my music.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cant send money, please share this link on social media and put it in the faces of all who support Christian rap, and the arts associated with glorifying God.

story:
My Story

Munich born, London-based, I am the contemporary one-man-band. Combining classical songwriting like The Beatles and The Velvet Underground with a Hip Hop edge and electronic textures.

The Spirit of La Masia is the second song on my new EP, Still Too Few. In one sentence, it’s about not backing down, keeping on keeping on, persevering no matter how big the obstacle. Your contributions will be funding its new music video, where I will have objects such as smoke bombs and tar and feathers thrown at me in slow motion.  This is music to mobilise the mobile disciples to reclaim their independence.

Make my Christmas dream come true and help me create the visual extension this song needs.




What We Need

I believe that everyone in this project should be paid for their involvement and I need to raise £2,000 to do it.

Break Down:

Crew such as director, producer, first AD, hair and makeup etc.  £770

Van Hire  £80

Expenses (Travel, Miscellaneous)  £170

Insurance    £100

Props  £30

Location    £100

Camera/Lenses  £100

Lights/Generators etc.  £500

Post-Production  £150

 Total £2000


Meet the Team

Gennifer is a PA and has been involved in a successful Kickstarter campaign that raised over £16 000. She is now keen to move into music management and more crowdfunding projects.


Eno is a talented director who has worked on music videos, films and commercials. She looks forward to directing the official video for The Spirit of La Masia.


Marija is an up and coming photographer who specialises in fashion and portraiture. She is documenting and assisting in the campaign process.


Raffi - I am DrawnSword.


The Impact

I believe in trusting yourself, validating yourself. Embracing what defines you, what might seem like a weakness to others but in reality is what makes you special. Help me spread this message to the world.

Please share this with your friends and family, use the Indiegogo share tools.


PLEASE spread the word and share share share!!

story:
Music & Me

  • I've been playing and practicing music since 1st grade
  • I started teaching myself guitar and writing music at age 16
  • Music is something that I hold as near and dear to me as my loved ones
  • This EP will give me the opportunity to bring my musical creations to a whole new level 
  • Without contributions, I unfortunately not be able to record the EP or release it on different music platforms such as iTunes, Spotify, etc 

What I Need & What You Get

  • The money I raise in this campaign will go towards all the necessary instrumentalists and production that will make this EP something special
  • The EP will include instrumentals from an extremely talented violinist, drummer, and bassist 
  • The amazing Patrick Bedore will be recording and accumulating the tracks from his home studio alongside myself 
  • All drum recording, mixing, and mastering will be handled at Mobtown Studios (the majority of the costs for the EP due to the professional level of the work handled at the studio)
  • Alongside my music, I practice a lot of visual art 
  • The perks I have included to people who donate certain amounts are unique and personalized to the buyer for the most part!
  • You get a say in what you're receiving from me, therefore making what you obtain something special you won't find anywhere else 
  • If I don't reach my entire goal - the funds will go towards the mixing, mastering, and recording at Mobtown and I will attempt to pay the other musicians out of pocket 

The Impact

  • Your contributions will be the key factor in determining whether this project is able to reach its full potential or not 
  • I write all my songs simply on my guitar 
  • With the addition of multi-instrumentalists and professional recording, mixing, and mastering, I believe the tracks can be taken to an incredibly impactful level where they can provide the ultimate listening experience to anyone who stumbles across them or streams them online 
  • This project is very important to my growth as an artist and a creator 
  • Your help would mean the world to me 

Risks & Challenges

  • The recording process is a tough one 
  • It takes a lot of patience and good communication throughout all parties involved
  • The creative process can be extremely vulnerable 
  • I am lucky to have met and be working some incredible people who contribute beautifully to the project and understand the vision I have for THREE 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute money-wise, there are other ways you can help!

  • Help me spread the word out by sharing the link to my campaign with your friends and family!
  • Indiegogo has a bunch of share tools that allows you to share my campaign on all of your social media sites! 

Thanks so much for reading this over! 

Much love to all of you <3

It takes a lot of patience and good communication throughout all parties involved
The creative process can be extremely vulnerable  I am lucky to have met and be working some incredible people who contribute beautifully to the project and understand the vision I have for THREE     Other Ways You Can Help Even if you can't contribute money-wise, there are other ways you can help!  Help me spread the word out by sharing the link to my campaign with your friends and family! Indiegogo has a bunch of share tools that allows you to share my campaign on all of your social media sites!    Thanks so much for reading this over! Much love to all of you <3

story:
Thank you for stopping by!

Firstly, thank you for taking time to look at my campaign!  Every view and share truly means a lot to me.
Music is a big part of who I am.  Music has the power to accompany us through life's ups and downs, console us, and rejoice with us.  The songs on this album have mostly been written over the past six years and have been influenced by soul, rock, pop and reggae.  They are a part of my story, and a part of me.  My heart, soul, mind, work and money have gone into this project.    
I did have another Indiegogo campaign at the start of the project, but I didn't advertise it well enough and raised less than a tenth of recording costs.  Now, I have put my savings into the project and funds are getting low, so close to the end.  The campaign video is an example of one of the songs on the album, already mixed and mastered.   

Our Target

All the recordings are finished, and the sound engineer (Steve Vertigan) and session musicians (Peter Maslen, Jason Vorherr, Peter Farnan and Belinda Parsons) did such an amazing job that I couldn't be happier with the standard.  

All we need to do from this point is mix and master the audio and design the album artwork.  It would be disappointing to get this close, and then be stuck, unable to polish up all the work that we've done.  So, I have come up with some exciting rewards for those who decide to help me finally get this project across the line. 

Exciting perks include: 

  • house concerts
  • assistance writing a song
  • music lessons
  • original artwork
  • palette & piano T-shirt 
  • personal thank you letter
  • a signed copy of my debut album (not the same quality as this one, but limited no. copies exist)
  • I am also open to suggestions for perk ideas

The target set for this campaign is only $2,500, but even so, I don't 'need' to hit that target.  $1000 should be more than enough to do the touch ups and have the audio ready.  At that stage, I would have MP3 files ready for digital downloads.  The rest of the target is assigned to artwork design, and manufacturing of some physical copies (which I have promised the contributors of my original campaign, plus they would be nice to sell at gigs).  So if we don't hit the target, the funds will go towards mixing and mastering the completed recordings.         

The Impact

At this stage of the process, I will honestly appreciate any help whatsoever in getting over the line.  Like I mentioned earlier, some of these songs are over six years old.  Plus, the recording process has taken over thirteen months now.  Deciding to create this music has meant that my wife and I have had to make some sacrifices, so it would be nice to have the finished product done. 

There is already so much music 'out there', and you may even question why the world even needs more music.  I only really have two counter points for such thinking:

  • high quality recordings and arrangements 
  • positive, heartfelt lyrics  

"Michael has presented me with a number of songs in a diverse range of musical styles. I have listened to each of the songs with great interest as he captures each style with great skill. He has written a number of very strong songs with great lyrical narrative and melodic progression. I'll look forward to working with Michael and some of Australia's best contemporary musicians to help bring these songs into the public arena".

Steve Vertigan  Producer/Engineer at Soggy Dog Recording

My hope for these songs is that they might have a positive influence on someone's life out there.  Please help me share my music.

Risks & Challenges

At this point, there are very few risks and challenges to overcome.  I have seen a music album project through from start to finish before, so I am aware of some of the challenges.  However, more than that, I have surrounded myself with the best possible team I could find.  I did my research and found Soggy Dog Recording.  Steve has so much more experience and knowledge than me, so it has been wonderful watching him 'bring out' my songs better than I could have done myself.  Again, I would also like to mention the talented session musicians, it was a great pleasure witnessing your technical skills.    

Other Ways You Can Help

You may want to help me finish up this album, but simply can't contribute right now.  Of course that's fine; maybe you would like to help me spread the word about this campaign, shout out, make some noise in real life, or on social media.  Indiegogo also have a range of share tools built just for that purpose. 

Once again, thank you for spending time on my campaign page!  I can not stress enough how much every effort is appreciated!

story:
Short Summary


              After a period of nearly a year of operation in Moldova, we decided to make a big change: we want to move in the UK. It is clear that we will further increase our product quality, with this change. Get involved and help us to see our dream fulfilled. We need funds to change location, and to purchase some additional equipment. Let's make noise together!
From the start, our mission was to promote the underground music, in all its fullness - and i am talking about the young producers, DJ's, writers, composers etc. 

We turn our attention to the most representative styles of global dance music, like House, Deep House, Techno, Drum&Bass, Trance, Progressive, Future House, and many more. We do it with love, from the heart and with the confidence that we could give a helping hand to all those who believe like any beginning is difficult. Because they have right. In our turn we were helped, and now everything goes well, we do well and we love what we are doing. But now we need you to give us a hand to make another big step: get out of the dark, and find a place near the grands!

We are a great team - people involved with their works, passion and love for the global dance movement. And we want more. We want to be in the middle of what is called the world's cultural core, and therefore we have decided to move in UK.

We have ensured the broadcasting studio location there, but we need more funds to move itself, and properly equipping a little bit more this studio. For us it is very important your help. Think that will actually contribute to the realization of a dream that once achieved, will help fulfill the dreams of others. Because we worked very hard to make others famous, to offer a radio station that any artist to be able to say its word with us.


We need 5,000 USD for travel expenses, for setting up the studio, and for a few other tools for an up-level broadcasting (external audio card, mic, audio processor, etc).

We have in mind to make a new stunning website, and we are thinking for an advertising campaign, to let people know what we want to do once arrived in UK.

You'll get our gratitude and respect, among our full support package, if you're an artist. Our Hall of Fame will be proud to keep up the names of all of our supporters, and we have in mind to bring more surprises for you.


So please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign, using the Indiegogo share tools!

Thanks,

Dancebandada Team

www.dancebandada.com

story:
An heartfelt THANK YOU to: Gaia D'Estais, Jean-Baptiste Voisin, G. D'E., G.M., Stefano Diana, Giuseppe Bruno, Giuseppe Devastato, Giovanna Apicella, Gioacchino Longobardi, William Schroer, Concha Elejabetia y Jaime, Stefano Paone, Rocco Perna, Mamen Reviejo, Amparo Casanova, Roberto Pisani, Gabriela Caballero Hernandez, Piero Pisani, Peppe D'Avino, P.M., Michele Rossi, Luciana Cumino, Cristina Rodriguez Melendez, Diego Lucchesi, Pilar Ramos Pelaez, Maria Diez Ruiz, Gregorio, Serrano Castro, M. Carmen Gomez Ferrer, Aurea Viñas Mateos, M. Isabel Merino Puerta, Gracia Alvarez Audies, M. Amor Fombella, Serafín Barrio Diez, Pilar Rius Fortea, Joe Devastato, R.S.,Andrea e i Corsari, Luca Romano

Thank you so much! Grazie mille! Muchas gracias!


Click qui per Italiano! Click aquí para Español

Ritratti (portraits) Project

The Ritratti Project is a crowdfunding campaign, the object of which is to present musical and artistic ‘Portraits’ on an album and in crossover productions around the world, thereby taking this wonderful music to a wider audience. In order to do that we need to raise the $7000 necessary to record the Ritratti Album and cover the flight costs of the Ritratti Tour.

Ritratti is not only the pianist Cristina Cavalli. There are other portraits and other faces are involved: Alessandro Mercurio, director, scriptwriter & actor in Canada, Ursula Caporali, pianist and composer in Australia, and Michelana Lam, university music professor in Hong Kong.

In each place the musical portraits will change their shape: in Montreal they'll interact with voices and images thanks to Alessandro; in Sydney they will assume a Dotted Face thanks to Ursula, who put in her composition sounds and other elements coming from the Aboriginal tradition; in Australia Ritratti will also become a real portrait on a canvas thanks to painting. In Hong Kong, hopefully all together (if the amount raised is enough), we'll give life to all the faces at a time.

What makes the difference

There are plenty of recording projects, many of them really worthy, but Ritratti aims to be something more: a project with several people involved, which connects music to other arts and joins the idea of a multidisciplinary collaboration, an idea which is, in our opinion, a great resource for the future. Also, this way we are allowed to take with us on the way friends, colleagues, and all the wonderful persons who appreciate courage, effort and… maybe a bit of boldness.

What you get if you take part

Depending on which option you choose:

  • Physical signed copy of the Ritratti Album
  • Personalized Thank You Tweet!
  • Digital download of El Trébol
  • Ritratti Postcard
  • Ritratti Signed Photo
  • Digital download of the full Ritratti Album
  • Help children + Ritratti CD 
  • Ritratti T-Shirt
  • Personalized Thank You Video (read more in the Perks section!!)
  • Ritratti CD + T-Shirt
  • Piano Masterclass in Madrid with Cristina Cavalli
  • Ritratti CD+T-Shirt+Personalized Video!!
  • Supporter of Ritratti
  • Patron of Ritratti
  • Local House Concert
  • Piano recital everywhere in Europe
  • Piano recital worldwide

Who are we? 

What else in addition to music and why

Cristina Cavalli - Pianist and  Piano and Chamber Music teacher

I am an Italian pianist, currently living in Madrid. I strongly believe in sharing music through all possible ways, in particular by interactions with other artists and people. Find out more about me on my personal website here.

(Live concert in Helsinki, video credits: Alfa TV; find out more videos here)

Alessandro Mercurio  - Director, Actor and Scriptwriter

I moved from Milan to Montreal (QC) 5 years ago. I believe in interdisciplinary exchange and in projects that have a "taste of challenge". Find out more about me on my website www.absurdeproduction.com



Ursula Caporali - Composer and Pianist

I am an Italian pianist and composer, living now in Sydney (Australia). I believe only a serious and attentive passion makes music great. Find out more about me by clicking here.
 


Michelana Lam - Piano and Music teacher, President of IIME, Hong Kong.
My rationale to teaching is to help students develop not only a well-rounded musicianship with strong technical competence, but also a unique personality with positive values through a comprehensively artistic and humanistic approach.

    Ways You Can Help

    If you like what you hear and wish to make a donation and get one of the perks, just go to the "Perks" section, where you will find instructions to make your payment safely and quickly.

    If you have any questions about how to do the payment or how to do it in an alternative way, don't hesitate to send an email to: crist.cavalli@gmail.com

    If you would like to be a part of this project but are unable to donate at the moment, there are still lots of ways that you can help (and we would be so grateful!!):

    • Direct people to the indiegogo page
    • Share the campaign on Facebook or Twitter (or other social networks)
    • Email your family and friends around the world (this is most effective)
    • Spread the word to music magazines, websites, blogs and other industry folks about the campaign.
    Thank you so much!

    What music and why?

    Ritratti means "portraits" in Italian and our project is all about the idea of the portrait in music in the XX and XXI centuries...  in a way, contemporary portraits! Because all old music has been new music once.

    The album includes the following piano pieces:

    • Sergei Rachmaninov    Elegie Op. 3 n. 1 
    • Carlos Guastavino        Cantilenas argentinas:  Santa Fé para llorar, El Trebol
                                                         Cantos Populares n.  4, 6, 10  
     
    • Alberto Ginastera        Tres danzas argentinas

                                                        Four American preludes: 
                                                           - Tribute to Roberto Garcia Morillo 
                                                           - Tribute to Juan José Castro 
                                                           - Tribute to Aaron Copland 
                                                           - Tribute to Heitor Villa-Lobos 

    • Francis Poulenc            Hommage à Edith Piaf

    • Giuseppe Devastato    Toccata 

    • Joaquin Rodrigo            Caleseras (Homenaje a Chueca) 

    • Ursula Caporali              The dotted face
    • Maurice Ravel                 Pavane pour une infante defunte
    • Leos Janacek                  1.x.1905 Piano Sonata 
    • Tero-Pekka Henell        Alla luce 

    (Click here for a full description of each piece on Cristina Cavalli's website)

    Featured perks

    Ritratti CD:


    Help Children:


    Piano Masterclass in Madrid:



    Italiano

    Ritratti Project

    Ritratti project è la campagna di crowdfunding che si ripropone di presentare ritratti musicali e artistici in un album (CD) e in produzioni crossover in giro per il mondo, portando questa musica meravigliosa a un pubblico più vasto. Per fare questo ci servono 7.000 $ per registrare l’album Ritratti e coprire i costi di viaggio del Ritratti Tour.

    Ritratti non è solo il pianoforte di Cristina Cavalli: altri ritratti, altri volti sono coinvolti: Alessandro Mercurio, regista, attore e sceneggiatore in Canada, Ursula Caporali, compositrice e pianista in Australia, e Michelana Lam, professoressa all'Università di Hong Kong.

    In ogni luogo i ritratti musicali cambieranno forma: a Montreal interagiranno con le voci e le immagini grazie ad Alessandro; a Sydney diventeranno una Dotted Face (volto a punti) grazie ad Ursula, che ha inserito nella sua composizione elementi presi dalla tradizione locale aborigena; in Australia Ritratti diventerà anche un ritratto vero e proprio grazie alla pittura. A Hong Kong infine, speriamo tutti insieme (se la cifra raccolta sarà sufficiente) di dar vita a questi volti multiformi in una unica produzione. 

    Cosa fa la differenza

    Ci sono migliaia di album in fase di produzione, molti di questi davvero belli, ma Ritratti vuol essere qualcosa di diverso, qualcosa di più: un progetto con più persone coinvolte,  che unisce la musica ad altre arti e propone l’idea della collaborazione interdisciplinare, idea in cui secondo noi ci sono risorse importanti per il nostro futuro. E poi produrre così ci dà la possibilità di portare con noi lungo il percorso tutte quelle persone che vorranno esserne parte, condividendo con noi coraggio, sforzi e… anche un pizzico di audacia.

    I premi per il vostro contributo
    • Copia fisica autografata di Ritratti CD
    • Tweet di ringraziamento personalizzato
    • Download di El Trèbol (versione digitale)
    • Ritratti Postcard
    • Foto Ritratti autografata con dedica personale
    • Download di Ritratti Album completo (versione digitale)
    • Ritratti T-Shirt
    • Video di Ringraziamento Personalizzato!! (leggi di più nella sezione Perks)
    • Ritratti CD + T-Shirt
    • Masterclass di Pianoforte a Madrid con Cristina Cavalli
    • Ritratti CD + T-Shirt + Video Personalizzato
    • Supporter di Ritratti (il tuo nome sul CD!)
    • Patron di Ritratti (il tuo nome sul CD nella sezione Patron!)
    • Concerto Privato (Cristina Cavalli in concerto a casa tua!)
    • Recital di pianoforte in Europa
    • Recital di pianoforte nel Mondo

    Chi siamo

    Cos'altro oltre alla musica e perché

    Cristina Cavalli - Pianista e docente di Pianoforte e Musica da Camera

    Sono una pianista italiana e vivo attualmente a Madrid. Credo fermamente nel condividere la musica in tutti i modi possibili, soprattutto attraverso l’interazione con altri artisti e quella diretta con la gente. Scoprite di più su di me cliccando qui.


    Alessandro Mercurio - Regista, Attore e Sceneggiatore

    Mi sono trasferito da Milano a Montreal (Québec, Canada) 5 anni fa. Credo nello scambio interdisciplinare e nei progetti che hanno il gusto della sfida. Scoprite di più su di me cliccando qui.


    Ursula Caporali - Compositrice e Pianista

    Sono una pianista e compositrice italiana che vive attualmente a Sydney (Australia). Credo che solo una seria e attenta passione faccia grande la musica. Scoprite di più su di me cliccando qui.


    Michelana Lam - Docente di Pianoforte, Presidente dell’IIME, Hong Kong.

    La mia idea di insegnamento è aiutare gli studenti a sviluppare non solo una forte e completa preparazione musicale, ma anche una personalità peculiare corroborata da valori positivi, attraverso un approccio globale sia umanistico che artistico. 

    Come potete aiutarci

    Se l'idea vi piace e volete dare il vostro contributo ricevendo in cambio uno dei riconoscimenti, andate alla sezione "Perks" e seguite le istruzioni per fare il pagamento in modo sicuro e veloce.

    Se avete dubbi su come fare il pagamento o domande su come farlo in maniera alternativa (nel caso non possediate una carta di credito o debito) scrivete una email a: crist.cavalli@gmail.com

    Se vorreste far parte del progetto ma non potete contribuire al momento, ci sono altri modi per aiutarci (e noi ve ne saremo molto riconoscenti!!):

    • Indirizzate i vostri amici e conoscenti alla pagina della campagna su Indiegogo
    • Condividete la campagna su Facebook, Twitter e altri social network
    • Scrivete personalmente una email ai vostri amici e parenti nel mondo (questo è più efficace)
    • Passate parola sul progetto a riviste, quotidiani, siti web, blog e gente dell’ambiente della comunicazione e della musica e arte
    Grazie di cuore!

    Quale musica e perché

    Ritratti è costruito sull’idea del ritratto in musica, ritratti musicali del XX e XXI secolo… ci piace definirli ritratti contemporanei, perché ogni vecchia musica è stata nuova musica una volta.

    • Sergei Rachmaninov    Elegie Op. 3 n. 1 
    • Carlos Guastavino        Cantilenas argentinas:  Santa Fé para llorar, El Trebol
                                                         Cantos Populares n.  4, 6, 10  
     
    • Alberto Ginastera         Tres danzas argentinas

                                                         Four American preludes: 
                                                            - Tribute to Roberto Garcia Morillo 
                                                            - Tribute to Juan José Castro 
                                                            - Tribute to Aaron Copland 
                                                            - Tribute to Heitor Villa-Lobos 

    • Francis Poulenc              Hommage à Edith Piaf

    • Giuseppe Devastato      Toccata 

    • Joaquin Rodrigo              Caleseras (Homenaje a Chueca) 

    • Ursula Caporali                The dotted face
    • Maurice Ravel                   Pavane pour une infante defunte
    • Leos Janacek                    1.x.1905 Piano Sonata 
    • Tero-Pekka Henell           Alla luce 

    (Leggete di più su ogni singolo brano sul sito di Cristina Cavalli)

    I Premi più consigliati:

    Ritratti CD:

    Masterclass di Pianoforte a Madrid:



    Español

    Ritratti (retratos) Project

    Ritratti Project es una campaña crowdfunding que quiere presentar retratos musicales y artísticos en un Album de Piano y en producciones crossover alrededor del mundo, llevando esta música maravillosa a un público más grande. Para hacer eso necesitamos 7.000 $ para grabar el album Ritratti y cobrir los gastos de viaje para el Ritratti Tour.

    Ritratti no es solo el Piano de Cristina Cavalli: otros retratos, otras caras son involucradas: Alessandro Mercurio, director, actor y guionista en Canada, Ursula Caporali, compositora y pianista en Australia, y Michelana Lam, profesora a la Universidad de Hong Kong.

    En cada sitio los retratos cambiarán de forma: en Montreal juntándose con las voces y las imagenes gracias a Alessandro, en Sydney cogerán forma de Dotted Face (cara a puntos) gracias a Ursula, que puso en su composición algunos elementos de la tradición aborigena; en Australia Ritratti encontrará también colores y lienzo gracias a la pintura. En Hong Kong, esperamos todos juntos (si la cifra recogida será suficiente) daremos vida a todos estos retratos a la vez.

    ¿Qué hace la diferencia?

    Hay cientos de proyectos de grabación, muchos de los cuales valorables, pero Ritratti se propone como algo más: un proyecto que involucra a más personas, que une la música con las otras artes y se fija en la idea de la colaboración interdisciplinar, una idea que creemos ser un gran recurso para nuestro futuro. Además, trabajar así nos permite llevar con nosotros en el recorrido todas las personas que nos apoyarán y comparten con nosotros coraje, esfuerzos y… un poco de audacia.

    Que vais a conseguir

    Según lo que vayas a elegir:

    Quien somos

    Música, que más y ¿porqué?

    Cristina Cavalli - Pianista y Profesora de Piano y Música de Cámara

    Soy una pianista Italiana y vivo actualmente en Madrid. Creo firmemente en el compartir la música a través de todos los medios posibles, particularmente con la interacción con otros artistas y con la gente. Descubre más haciendo click aquí.


    Alessandro Mercurio - Director, Actor y Guionista

    Me mudé en Montreal hace 5 años; creo en el intercambio interdisciplinar y en aquellos proyectos que tienen el gusto del desafío. Descubre más sobre mi haciendo click aquí.

    .

    Ursula Caporali - Compositora y Pianista

    Soy una compositora y pianista Italiana, que vive ahora en Sydney (Australia). Creo firmemente que solo una pasión seria y atenta haga grande la música. Descubre más sobre mi haciendo click aquí.


    Michelana Lam - Profesora de Piano y Música, Presidenta del IIME, Hong Kong.

    Mi enfoque en la enseñanza es de ayudar al estudiante no solo a desarrollar una segura y sólida preparación musical, sino también una personalidad unica, a través de un recorrido global muy completo, humanístico y artístico.

    Como ayudarnos

    Si la idea te gusta y quieres dar tu contribución, sigue en la sección "Perks", donde encontrarás instrucciones para hacer el pago de manera rápida y sencilla.

    Si tienes dudas sobre como hacer el pago o quieres hacerlo de una manera alternativa (en el caso  que no tengas una tarjeta de debito o credito) no dudes en enviar un correo a: crist.cavalli@gmail.com

    Si quisieras ser parte del proyecto pero no puedes donar en este momento, hay todavía otras formas de echarnos una mano (y nosotros estaremos muy agradecidos!!): 

    • Dar a conocer a la gente la página de Indiegogo
    • Compartir la campaña en Facebook, Twitter y otros social network
    • Escribir por correo a amigos y parientes sobre el tema (esto es más efectivo)
    • Hacer correr la voz con revistas de música, páginas web, blog y personas en el mundo artistico y de la comunicación
    Mil gracias!

    ¿Cual música y porqué?

    Ritratti significa “retratos” en Italiano, y gira alrededor de la idea del retrato en música en los siglos XX y XI… nos gusta llamarlosretratos contemporáneos, porqué cada vieja música ha sido nueva música una vez.

An heartfelt THANK YOU to: Gaia D'Estais, Jean-Baptiste Voisin, G. D'E., G.M., Stefano Diana, Giuseppe Bruno, Giuseppe Devastato, Giovanna Apicella, Gioacchino Longobardi, William Schroer, Concha Elejabetia y Jaime, Stefano Paone, Rocco Perna, Mamen Reviejo, Amparo Casanova, Roberto Pisani, Gabriela Caballero Hernandez, Piero Pisani, Peppe D'Avino, P.M., Michele Rossi, Luciana Cumino, Cristina Rodriguez Melendez, Diego Lucchesi, Pilar Ramos Pelaez, Maria Diez Ruiz, Gregorio, Serrano Castro, M. Carmen Gomez Ferrer, Aurea Viñas Mateos, M. Isabel Merino Puerta, Gracia Alvarez Audies, M. Amor Fombella, Serafín Barrio Diez, Pilar Rius Fortea, Joe Devastato, R.S.,Andrea e i Corsari, Luca RomanoThank you so much! Grazie mille! Muchas gracias!Click qui per Italiano!
Click aquí para Español Ritratti (portraits) Project
The Ritratti Project is a crowdfunding campaign, the object of which is to present musical and artistic ‘Portraits’ on an album and in crossover productions around the world, thereby taking this wonderful music to a wider audience. In order to do that we need to raise the $7000 necessary to record the Ritratti Album and cover the flight costs of the Ritratti Tour.
Ritratti is not only the pianist Cristina Cavalli. There are other portraits and other faces are involved: Alessandro Mercurio, director, scriptwriter & actor in Canada, Ursula Caporali, pianist and composer in Australia, and Michelana Lam, university music professor in Hong Kong.




In each place the musical portraits will change their shape: in Montreal they'll interact with voices and images thanks to Alessandro; in Sydney they will assume a Dotted Face thanks to Ursula, who put in her composition sounds and other elements coming from the Aboriginal tradition; in Australia Ritratti will also become a real portrait on a canvas thanks to painting. In Hong Kong, hopefully all together (if the amount raised is enough), we'll give life to all the faces at a time.
What makes the difference
There are plenty of recording projects, many of them really worthy, but Ritratti aims to be something more: a project with several people involved, which connects music to other arts and joins the idea of a multidisciplinary collaboration, an idea which is, in our opinion, a great resource for the future. Also, this way we are allowed to take with us on the way friends, colleagues, and all the wonderful persons who appreciate courage, effort and… maybe a bit of boldness.
What you get if you take part

Depending on which option you choose:


Physical signed copy of the Ritratti Album

Personalized Thank You Tweet!
Digital download of El Trébol
Ritratti Postcard
Ritratti Signed Photo
Digital download of the full Ritratti Album

Piano Masterclass in Madrid with Cristina Cavalli

Who are we? 

What else in addition to music and whyCristina Cavalli - Pianist and  Piano and Chamber Music teacher

I am an Italian pianist, currently living in Madrid. I strongly believe in sharing music through all possible ways, in particular by interactions with other artists and people. Find out more about me on my personal website here.
(Live concert in Helsinki, video credits: Alfa TV; find out more videos here)

Alessandro Mercurio  - Director, Actor and Scriptwriter
I moved from Milan to Montreal (QC) 5 years ago. I believe in interdisciplinary exchange and in projects that have a "taste of challenge". Find out more about me on my website www.absurdeproduction.com

Ursula Caporali - Composer and Pianist

I am an Italian pianist and composer, living now in Sydney (Australia). I believe only a serious and attentive passion makes music great. Find out more about me by clicking here.
 Michelana Lam - Piano and Music teacher, President of IIME, Hong Kong.My rationale to teaching is to help students develop not only a well-rounded musicianship with strong technical competence, but also a unique personality with positive values through a comprehensively artistic and humanistic approach.    Ways You Can Help 
If you like what you hear and wish to make a donation and get one of the perks, just go to the "Perks" section, where you will find instructions to make your payment safely and quickly.
If you have any questions about how to do the payment or how to do it in an alternative way, don't hesitate to send an email to: crist.cavalli@gmail.com

If you would like to be a part of this project but are unable to donate at the moment, there are still lots of ways that you can help (and we would be so grateful!!):  Direct people to the indiegogo page Share the campaign on Facebook or Twitter (or other social networks)
Email your family and friends around the world (this is most effective)
Spread the word to music magazines, websites, blogs and other industry folks about the campaign.


Thank you so much!

What music and why?
Ritratti means "portraits" in Italian and our project is all about the idea of the portrait in music in the XX and XXI centuries...  in a way, contemporary portraits! Because all old music has been new music once.
The album includes the following piano pieces:
Sergei Rachmaninov    Elegie Op. 3 n. 1 
Carlos Guastavino        Cantilenas argentinas:  Santa Fé para llorar, El Trebol                                                     Cantos Populares n.  4, 6, 10   Alberto Ginastera        Tres danzas argentinas
                                                    Four American preludes:                                                        - Tribute to Roberto Garcia Morillo                                                        - Tribute to Juan José Castro                                                        - Tribute to Aaron Copland                                                        - Tribute to Heitor Villa-Lobos 
Francis Poulenc            Hommage à Edith Piaf

Giuseppe Devastato    Toccata 
Joaquin Rodrigo            Caleseras (Homenaje a Chueca) 

Ursula Caporali              The dotted face
Maurice Ravel                 Pavane pour une infante defunte
Leos Janacek                  1.x.1905 Piano Sonata 
Tero-Pekka Henell        Alla luce

Italiano
Ritratti Project

Ritratti project è la campagna di crowdfunding che si ripropone di presentare ritratti musicali e artistici in un album (CD) e in produzioni crossover in giro per il mondo, portando questa musica meravigliosa a un pubblico più vasto. Per fare questo ci servono 7.000 $ per registrare l’album Ritratti e coprire i costi di viaggio del Ritratti Tour.
Ritratti non è solo il pianoforte di Cristina Cavalli: altri ritratti, altri volti sono coinvolti: Alessandro Mercurio, regista, attore e sceneggiatore in Canada, Ursula Caporali, compositrice e pianista in Australia, e Michelana Lam, professoressa all'Università di Hong Kong.



In ogni luogo i ritratti musicali cambieranno forma: a Montreal interagiranno con le voci e le immagini grazie ad Alessandro; a Sydney diventeranno una Dotted Face (volto a punti) grazie ad Ursula, che ha inserito nella sua composizione elementi presi dalla tradizione locale aborigena; in Australia Ritratti diventerà anche un ritratto vero e proprio grazie alla pittura. A Hong Kong infine, speriamo tutti insieme (se la cifra raccolta sarà sufficiente) di dar vita a questi volti multiformi in una unica produzione. 

Cosa fa la differenza
Ci sono migliaia di album in fase di produzione, molti di questi davvero belli, ma Ritratti vuol essere qualcosa di diverso, qualcosa di più: un progetto con più persone coinvolte,  che unisce la musica ad altre arti e propone l’idea della collaborazione interdisciplinare, idea in cui secondo noi ci sono risorse importanti per il nostro futuro. E poi produrre così ci dà la possibilità di portare con noi lungo il percorso tutte quelle persone che vorranno esserne parte, condividendo con noi coraggio, sforzi e… anche un pizzico di audacia.

Cristina Cavalli - Pianista e docente di Pianoforte e Musica da Camera

Sono una pianista italiana e vivo attualmente a Madrid. Credo fermamente nel condividere la musica in tutti i modi possibili, soprattutto attraverso l’interazione con altri artisti e quella diretta con la gente. Scoprite di più su di me cliccando qui.


Alessandro Mercurio - Regista, Attore e Sceneggiatore


Mi sono trasferito da Milano a Montreal (Québec, Canada) 5 anni fa. Credo nello scambio interdisciplinare e nei progetti che hanno il gusto della sfida. Scoprite di più su di me cliccando qui.

Ursula Caporali - Compositrice e Pianista


Sono una pianista e compositrice italiana che vive attualmente a Sydney (Australia). Credo che solo una seria e attenta passione faccia grande la musica. Scoprite di più su di me cliccando qui.


Michelana Lam - Docente di Pianoforte, Presidente dell’IIME, Hong Kong.
La mia idea di insegnamento è aiutare gli studenti a sviluppare non solo una forte e completa preparazione musicale, ma anche una personalità peculiare corroborata da valori positivi, attraverso un approccio globale sia umanistico che artistico.

Passate parola sul progetto a riviste, quotidiani, siti web, blog e gente dell’ambiente della comunicazione e della musica e arte

Grazie di cuore!

Quale musica e perché

story:
Hello everyone! Welcome to my indiegogo Campaign!

My goal is to be able to share my music with everyone. To deliver the frequency of love to the world out there, to be heard, to inspire, and to make a difference ...

You will also make a difference by helping the Fondation of the association HaitiCosmos : FondationCosmos, which works for the education and health in Haiti. 

The rhythm of your life, the rhythm of your thought, let us write together this beautiful story " Present Moment " 

My goal for this project is to "GIVE"...

                                                                ***


                                     

                                                  Pic © Plein Feux Festival


Who I am and What makes me want to get in touch with you ?

My name is Ted Beaubrun, and I am a drummer, singer, songwriter, producer, dad, husband and good friend!

I drew my strength from the public’s show of faith and their enthusiastic reception of my first ‘Voodoo Pop’ album “Lâcher prise”, (Letting go), released in 2014. To continue to resonate with the public, I plan to go back in the studio in March 2016, to record my second album “Moment présent “(Present Moment). And I'd love for you to be part of this new project.

                                                                          ***



   


"Moment présent", the new ALBUM

"Moment présent" aims to be even more authentic, both in the exploration of my cultural rhythms my voodoo culture and my connected to pop music. It will consist of 12 tracks that illustrate the new knowledge, human and spiritual experiences that have marked my daily life as an artist. Through "Moment présent" all while respecting a universal musical approach, I will keep the magic punctuated by Haitian goatskin drums, traditional instruments. I will have the honor of working and arranging with my father, Theodore "Lolo" Beaubrun , a founding member of Boukman Eksperyans in tribute to the rich and valuable heritage I inherited.

 


                 Pèpè Yè -Boukman Eksperyans - Prod. by Ted Beaubrun


What I Need and What You Get

Without a Record Label behind you, making this all manifest is a real deep mission!

In order to complete this album, a collection of $ 20,000 is required. These funds will cover the studio costs, mixing, mastering and graphic design of the album cover: 

  • $15,000 => Recording studio (Sound recording + mixing)

  • $ 3,000 => Mastering

  • $ 2,000 => Professional Graphics (Graphics CD cover)

Promoting the costs of the release of "Moment present” and gathering professional musicians participating in the recording sessions are sought from other organizations and sponsors.

Moment présent will be released in spring 2016  and with your support will be beneficial in helping  raise funds for the Fondation Cosmos in Haïti : FondationCosmos

                                                                    ***

                    

                                                Pic © Julian Morgan

What goes to you ? List of Perks 

Album -  Vinyl  - T-Shirt - Poster - VIP ticket for two person to one of my show - Free classes in Haitian drumming and check the right side for more ! 
And also the joy of helping the implementation of several activities for the Fondation Cosmos :  FondationCosmos in Haïti.
I want to thank you from the bottom of my heart !!

                                    

                                                          Pic © MajicMiju

Thank you and gratitude for your contribution 

My wish is to contribute through my work and your contribution, a radiation of musical diversity in Switzerland, Haiti and beyond borders. I express my gratitude, first for taking the time to click this page, and then for being the precious visionary patrons of my creation.

                                                                               ***

Other Ways You Can Help

you can still help in several important ways :

  • Ask friends to share the news and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Please use Indiegogo's share tools!
  • Email your friends or family around the world
  • Share the campaign link on your FB or twitter or Instagram page
  • Tell you friends directly about it

Any noise you can make to let others know is a step towards musical history we are writing together, NOW! 

Should I surpass the $20,000 goal, I will use the additional funds for an even better album campaign, get more copies, more promotion, budget for videos, etc.
Thank you !

AYIBOBO

story:
A nuestros amigos y seguidores.

El próximo 25 de Junio partimos a México en un viaje lleno de ilusiones y sueños. Vamos nosotras y nuestro equipo de trabajo con la pasión y determinación que nos caracteriza. Vamos a luchar por que nuestra música, nuestras canciones sean escuchadas y apreciadas. Vamos a cruzar fronteras y poner el nombre de Puerto Rico en alto. 

Va a ser un viaje lleno de retos. Atrás dejamos nuestras familias y seres queridos para seguir luchando.

Como saben, la carrera artística es una llena de vicisitudes.La hemos enfrentado con mucha pasión. Día a día escuchamos, no se puede, no se vende, no se hace asi, no, no... pero nosotras hemos siempre dicho, si, si, si y hasta aquí hemos llegado. Gracias a USTEDES, nuestro motor.

Pedimos con mucho respeto, que nos des la mano y nos ayudes con ésta campaña. Cualquier aportación es bienvenida. Si no puedes, conocemos la situación, comparte ésto y ayudanos a llegar a más y más personas.

UNNA Nation... Seguiremos conectados a ustedes a través de las redes. Los mantendremos informados de todo lo que esté pasando con nosotras. Pendientes a nuestro regreso.

Los queremos hasta el infinito!!!!

Besos,

Mily y Brigitte

UNNA
